item.description:
Update: I called to reserve a lane and found out that leagues run until around 9. So, for now I'm changing the time but feel free to change your rsvp if this is too late for you. We will probably go at least until 11 and the bowling drink deals go until midnight.

 

Thirsty Thursday at Norwich Bowling & Entertainment. $10/person cover charge: Unlimited Bowling and shoe rental included Cover charge gets access to: $1 8oz Drafts, $1 sm sodas and $1 hot dogs

group.name: Atheist Humanist Society of CT and RI

item.name: Bowling Night
